messages.zh: 莱茵生命临时极地科考点，时间XX-XX-XX
messages.en: Rhine Lab temporary polar research site, XX-XX-XX

messages.zh: 系统已解锁。
messages.en: System unlocked.

messages.zh: 确定年份：未知
messages.en: Year determined: unknown

messages.zh: 时间设置出现问题，现在转到手工控制。
messages.en: There is a problem with the time setting. Turning to manual control now.

messages.zh: 要进行下一步操作，请进行身份认证。
messages.en: To continue, please authenticate yourself.

messages.zh: 唔，我想想......嗯，莱茵生命科学考察员，麦哲伦。
messages.en: Well, let me think... Uh, Rhine Lab's science investigator, Magallan.

messages.zh: 认证中——
messages.en: Comfirming identity——

messages.zh: 认证完毕，声音样本已确认。
messages.en: Authentication is complete. Voice sample confirmed.

messages.zh: 哔哔——
messages.en: Beep——

messages.zh: 指纹已确认。
messages.en: Fingerprints confirmed.

messages.zh: （活泼的女声）嗨，你好呀麦麦，欢迎回来！
messages.en: (Lively female voice) Hi, Ma, welcome back!

messages.zh: 好怪哦！
messages.en: This feel strange!

messages.zh: 唉，早知道就不答应梅尔姐姐测试这个签到系统了，好奇怪的功能啊......
messages.en: *Sigh* If I had known about this, I would not have agreed with sister May's (Mayor) request to test this check-in system. What a strange feature...

messages.zh: 呼，总而言之，开始干活吧！
messages.en: Whew, regardless, time to work!

messages.zh: 今年最后一个勘察点，确认没有新的发现。
messages.en: I confirmed the last site of the year has no new discoveries.

messages.zh: 至此，本年度预定的勘查目标已经完成，确认其他各项任务完成后，将踏上返程。
messages.en: Currently, this year's scheduled exploration objectives have been completed, I also confirmed the completion of other tasks, and will set foot to return back soon.

messages.zh: 呼，搞定。
messages.en: Phew, done.

messages.zh: 写报告可真是我最不擅长的东西了，还是来听听梅尔姐姐的声音吧。
messages.en: Writing a report is not what I'm good at. Let's listen to sister May voice!

messages.zh: （活泼的女声）你好，麦麦。今天，是你本次外出勘察的第1，8，7天了哦。
messages.en: (Lively female voice) Hello, Ma. Today is your 1,8,7 days of surveying~

messages.zh: 哇，这一次也已经出来这么久啦，我都没有感觉了。
messages.en: Wow, I've been out for so long this time, I didn't feel time past so fast.

messages.zh: （活泼的女声）你已经出去很久了，也该回来了吧？大家都想你了。
messages.en: (Lively female voice) You've been out for a long time. I think it's time for you come back? Everyone missed you.

messages.zh: 欸？！之前有这一段吗......难道是梅尔姐姐偷偷录的然后设置了触发条件？
messages.en: What? ! Was there a recording like this before... Did sister May secretly recorded it and set the trigger?

messages.zh: 呜哇，不管怎么样，居然还有这样的小惊喜，好开心啊！
messages.en: Uwah, who cares how it's recorded, I'm so happy! This is such a nice small surprise!

messages.zh: 不过，说是说可以回去了，但是......
messages.en: Well, I said I could go back, but...

messages.zh: 这场暴风雪，恐怕还要持续至少一周呢，唉，幸好物资储备还算充裕。
messages.en: This blizzard will probably last for at least a week, thankfully my supplies are plentiful.

messages.zh: 算啦，还是来确认一遍任务表吧，我记得应该还有几个没有填的。
messages.en: Okay, let's go over the task list, I remember there's a few things left I haven't filled in yet.

messages.zh: 让我看看，嗯，周边的样本采集，完成。遗迹线索的寻找，没有~也算完成。
messages.en: Let's see, um, peripheral sampling, completed. The search of any clues for ruins, not completed yet~ There, all filled in.

messages.zh: 和去年比没有什么新发现呢，要是再来一个和大前年一样的发现就好了。
messages.en: Compared to last year, I found nothing new. If only we have made the same discovery we found three years ago.

messages.zh: 虽然说这才是常态啦，要是缪缪在肯定要批评我贪心了。
messages.en: Although this is the norm, if MueMue (Muesys) was here she would criticize me of being too greedy.

messages.zh: 应该没有了吧......嗯？还有一项空着，新材料的低温性质测试......啊。
messages.en: I think there's no work left to do... Hmm? There is a blank here, the test on the new material low temperature property... Ahh.

messages.zh: 我完全忘记了这件事！！！不如说这个新材料被我放哪儿去了来着！！！
messages.en: I completely forgot about it!!! I even forgot where I stored it?!!

messages.zh: 呜哇，赶紧找找，这个要是丢了我可要被梅尔姐姐杀掉了！
messages.en: Uwah, I gotta find it fast. If I lose this, sister May will definately kill me!

messages.zh: 呼，好险好险，原来被我塞在防寒服的口袋里忘了。
messages.en: Whew, I almost lost it, turns out I put it in my winter coat pocket and forgot all about it.

messages.zh: 不过，我带在身上这么久没去管它都没出事，应该已经证明了它的低温耐性了......吧？
messages.en: But, I haven't had a problem with it being on me for so long, which should have proved its low temperature tolerance... ?

messages.zh: 唔，虽然这一项只是梅尔姐姐私下拜托我的任务，不过还是应该再严谨一点才行。
messages.en: Well, although this is a private request that sister May asked me to do, I should be a little more serious.

messages.zh: 好吧，反正现在是暴风雪，干脆把它放到门外去摆一天看看好了。
messages.en: Alright then, there's a blizzard going on anyways, so let's just leave the new material outside for a day.

messages.zh: 现在外面的气温应该是最低的了。
messages.en: The temperature outside should be the lowest now.

messages.zh: 听着，麦哲伦，你要深呼吸，在打开门的瞬间，把东西丢出去，然后立刻关门。
messages.en: Listen, Magallan, you can do this! Take a deep breath, open the door, throw it out, and then close the door.

messages.zh: 要快，准，狠！不然暴风雪灌进来可就糟了。
messages.en: Be quick, be accurate, be firm! There would be a disaster if the blizzard came in.
Excuse me...

messages.zh: 鬼啊！！！
messages.en: A ghost!!!

messages.zh: 我刚才好像看到了一个超级漂亮的大姐姐，但是，这里可是极北之地，怎么可能会有人？
messages.en: I thought I saw a gorgeous woman, but this is the far north. How could there be anyone here?

messages.zh: 难、难道说东国的雪女传说是真的？！
messages.en: C-could it be that Yuki Onna legend from the east country is true? !

messages.zh: 不行不行，我要再开门看看，这可是惊天大发现！
messages.en: I must find out! I'll open the door again. What a discovery if it's true!

messages.zh: 哇，是真的雪女！
messages.en: Wow, it's really a Yuki Onna!

messages.zh: ......不对，这标志性的装束，加上耳朵，什么呀，原来只是萨米人吗。
messages.en: ... Wait, something's not right, this clothing logo, plus the ears. Huh? It's just a Sámian (Sámi).

messages.zh: 虽然不知道哪里让你失望了，不过我确实是萨米人。你好，小姑娘。
messages.en: I don't know where I let you down, but I am indeed a Sámian (Sámi). Nice to meet you, young lady.

messages.zh: 你好，漂亮的姐姐。总之，虽然不知道你是怎么到这里来的，不过先进来吧。
messages.en: Nice to meet you as well, beautiful lady. Anyway, I don't know how you got here, but come on in.

messages.zh: 即使是萨米人，对这样的暴风雪也没辙吧。
messages.en: Even a Sámian (Sámi) would have a hard time in this blizzard.

messages.zh: 谢谢你。
messages.en: Thank you.

messages.zh: 给，热茶。
messages.en: Here's your hot tea.

messages.zh: 谢谢。
messages.en: Thank you very much.

messages.zh: 姐姐你叫什么？
messages.en: What's your name?

messages.zh: 你可以叫我西蒙娜，你呢？
messages.en: You can call me Simona. What about yours?

messages.zh: 我叫麦哲伦，是这座观测站的负责人......说是这么说，其实现在只有我一个人在用啦。
messages.en: My name's Magallan, and I'm the head of this observatory... Actually, I'm the only one using it right now.

messages.zh: 原来如此。
messages.en: I see.

messages.zh: 西蒙娜姐姐为什么你会来这样的地方？
messages.en: So Simona, why would you come to a place like this?

messages.zh: 我是受人所托来找人的。
messages.en: I was asked to find someone.

messages.zh: 找人？这里可是极北之地哦，别说人了，我一个月连生物都见不到几只呢。
messages.en: Looking for a person? This far in the north? I haven't seen a living creature in a month, let alone a person.

messages.zh: 委托我的人说，她应该就在这一带活动。
messages.en: My requestor says she should be around in this area.

messages.zh: 你找她要做什么呢？
messages.en: Why are you finding her for?

messages.zh: 因为这场暴风雪将会持续很久很久，现在不回去，恐怕会有很久都回不去了，我是来接她的。
messages.en: Because this blizzard is going to last for a longer time. If we don't go back now, I'm afraid we won't be able to return for some time. I'm here to pick her up, you see.

messages.zh: 咦，是这样吗？！
messages.en: Oh, I understand now!

messages.zh: 萨米人......不，我了解雪。
messages.en: A Sámian (Sámi)... Rather I should say I know much about snow.

messages.zh: 唔，虽然我也看得出这场暴风雪可能要持续一段时间，但没想到这么严峻。
messages.en: Oh, while I predicted this blizzard might last for some time, I didn't expect it to be so severe.

messages.zh: 我还想等它弱一点了再走呢，这样的话，反而要趁现在它还没有变大先走了。
messages.en: I wanted to wait until it was a little weaker, but if that's the case, then I must leave now before it becomes even bigger.

messages.zh: 好吧，既然这么决定了，那就开始整理行李吧！
messages.en: Well, that's decided then, let's start packing.

messages.zh: 西蒙娜姐姐，不好意思，我要先准备一些东西。
messages.en: Simona, I'm sorry for the wait. But I have to get some things ready first.

messages.zh: 嗯，没关系，你去吧，不用管我。
messages.en: Oh, that's all right. You can go ahead and leave me be.

messages.zh: 行李箱，行李箱，行李箱去哪儿了来着？哦，想起来了，上个月被我拿来垫脚，放在厨房里了！
messages.en: Suitcase, suitcase, where did my suitcase go? Oh, come to think of it, I put it in the kitchen last month using it as a stepping stool!

messages.zh: 测绘仪和无人机的状况......嗯，没有问题！
messages.en: Coordinate measuring machine and my drones... Phew, no problems with them!

messages.zh: 不过得充一下电才行。
messages.en: But they have to be charged up first.

messages.zh: 麦哲伦，需要我帮忙吗？
messages.en: Magallan, do you need my help?

messages.zh: 啊，不用，这些我一个人就能完成的。
messages.en: Oh, no, I can do this all by myself.

messages.zh: 好吧。你是在这里工作吗?
messages.en: Alright. Do you work here?

messages.zh: 嗯，我在这里做勘测工作。
messages.en: Yes, I do survey work here.

messages.zh: 勘测什么？
messages.en: Surveying what?

messages.zh: 勘测这片冰原，寻找它过去的历史。
messages.en: Surveying the ice sheet and searching for past history.

messages.zh: 只有你一个人？
messages.en: Just you alone?

messages.zh: 嗯......一开始是有不少研究员一起过来的，不过最后他们都受不了这里的气候和枯燥，所以回去了。
messages.en: Yes... At first there were a lot of researchers with me, but in the end they couldn't stand the climate and boredom, so they went back.

messages.zh: 你呢？
messages.en: How are you feeling?

messages.zh: 我习惯了，毕竟我已经做勘测工作好多年啦。
messages.en: I'm used to it. After all, I've been doing surveying work for years.

messages.zh: ......你不讨厌那些抛弃你的人吗？
messages.en: ... You don't hate those who left you here?

messages.zh: 嗯......虽然没有能说话的人是有点遗憾，不过我也知道不是每个人都能像我一样乐在其中啦。
messages.en: Hmm... althought it's a pity there's no one to talk to, but I know not everyone enjoys this kind of work as much as I do.

messages.zh: 你还......真是相当乐观呢。
messages.en: You are... That's pretty optimistic of you.

messages.zh: 嘿嘿，借用一位前辈说的话，“探险家最好的朋友，就是孤独”！
messages.en: Hehe, to borrow a senior words, they once said, "An explorer's best friend, is loneliness."!

messages.zh: 哦，不过梅尔姐姐说我好像养成了下意识自言自语的习惯。有吗？应该没有吧？
messages.en: Oh, but sister May says I seem to have developed a habit of talking to myself subconsciously. Am I doing it now? Probably not, right?

messages.zh: 就算是有，也没有问题，你就这样就很好。
messages.en: Even so, that's not a big problem. You're fine.

messages.zh: 嘿嘿，是这样吗？
messages.en: Hehe, is that so?

messages.zh: 呵呵，是的。
messages.en: *Chuckles* Yes.

messages.zh: 嗯，观测站的能源储备应该也没有问题，只要设定好时间进入休眠状态就好，接下来......
messages.en: Well, the observatory's energy reserves should be fine, as long as it's set to go dormant, and then...

messages.zh: 麦哲伦，你知道我是感染者吧？
messages.en: Magallan, you know I'm infected, right?

messages.zh: 欸，嗯，毕竟西蒙娜姐姐你也没有怎么去掩盖。
messages.en: I do, after all, you didn't do much to cover yourself up.

messages.zh: 你不害怕吗？
messages.en: Aren't you scared of me?

messages.zh: 啊，这个不用担心哦，我们莱茵生命前年的研究表明，矿石病在人之间的传染其实条件很限定的，并没有人们想的那么可怕。
messages.en: Ah, don't worry about that. Rhine Lab research on the year before shows that the transmission of Oripathy between people is actually very limited and not as terrible as people think.
... I see.

messages.zh: 啊，对了，我这次出发前，梅尔姐姐说接下来可能要和一个叫做“罗德岛”的组织合作了。
messages.en: Oh, by the way, before I leave, sister May said she might be working with an organization called Rhodes Island.

messages.zh: 听说对方有能够抑制矿石病的技术呢，这可厉害了，我们都没有这样的技术。
messages.en: Rumor has it that they have the technology to suppress Oripathy, that's impressive of them, Rhine Lab doesn't have such technology.

messages.zh: 西蒙娜姐姐你要是想的话，回去之后可以来莱茵生命找我，我带你去治病。
messages.en: Simona if you want to, you can come back to Rhine Lab and find me, I will seek treatment for you.

messages.zh: 你不怕我是坏人吗？
messages.en: Aren't you afraid I could be a bad person?

messages.zh: 西蒙娜姐姐是坏人吗？
messages.en: Is Simona a bad person?

messages.zh: ......是啊，我是不是坏人呢。
messages.en: ... Yeah, am I a bad person, huh.

messages.zh: 我觉得姐姐这么漂亮，一定是好人。
messages.en: I think you're beautiful, so you must be a good person.

messages.zh: 是吗？
messages.en: Really?

messages.zh: 嗯。
messages.en: Yeah.

messages.zh: 麦哲伦，你有感觉到这里的温度降低了吗？
messages.en: Magallan, do you feel the temperature drop here?

messages.zh: 温度？咦，这么一说，确实比刚才要冷了一些......等等，难道说......
messages.en: The temperature? Well, it's a little colder than it was before... Wait, does that mean...

messages.zh: 警报，检测到温控设施出现异常，即将关闭供暖功能。
messages.en: Warning. Abnormality in the temperature control system detected. Heating will be turned off soon.
Warning...

messages.zh: 让我看看监控系统。
messages.en: Let me check the surveillance system.

messages.zh: 糟了，好像是冰雹破开了供暖管道。
messages.en: Oh, no. It looks like hail broke the heating pipe.

messages.zh: 这可不行，要立刻进行维修。
messages.en: This can't be left unrepaired. I must repair it immediately.

messages.zh: 快些收拾好行李直接离开不就好了吗？
messages.en: Why don't you just pack up and leave?

messages.zh: 不行。就这么离开的话，暴风雪会彻底破坏供暖设备。
messages.en: I can't. If I just leave, the blizzard will completely destroy the heating system.

messages.zh: 修理很麻烦吗？
messages.en: Is it difficult to repair?

messages.zh: 唔嗯......管道被设置在比较高的地方，这个天气要爬上去的话，有点难。
messages.en: Uh-huh... The pipe is set up at a high place, which is a little difficult to climb in this weather.

messages.zh: 那么，等到明年再来重新维修不就好了吗？你每年都会来的对吧？
messages.en: So, why not wait until next year to repair it? You come here every year, right?

messages.zh: 不，这座观测站，并不是只是为我而存在的，它建立的意义，是为所有可能会来到这里的探险家提供一个居所。
messages.en: That's not the point, this observatory does not exist just for me, it is built to provide a home for all explorers who might come here.

messages.zh: 那么，从它建立开始直到今天，除了我，还有别的访客吗？
messages.en: But, since its founding, have there been any other visitors besides me?

messages.zh: 这样的话，你的坚持又有什么意义呢？
messages.en: So what's the point of your insistence in repairing it?

messages.zh: 有的。
messages.en: There is.

messages.zh: 为什么这么肯定？
messages.en: Why are you so sure?

messages.zh: 因为，总有一天，会有人经过这里。
messages.en: Because, one day, someone will pass through here.

messages.zh: 这只是毫无根据的想法而已。
messages.en: That's just a baseless thought.

messages.zh: 不是的。
messages.en: No it's not.

messages.zh: 玻利维亚的黑流树海，卡西米尔的环山高地平原，伊比利亚的水下火山......这些地方，过去都没有人去过。
messages.en: Bolivia's forests, Kazimierz's mountain plains, Iberia's underwater volcanoes... These places have never been visited by anyone before.

messages.zh: 但是，现在，已经有人去过了，在那里，已经插上了探险家们的旗帜。
messages.en: Now, someone has been there to explore. The explorers' flag has been planted.

messages.zh: 这片大地上还有许多我们未曾踏足的地方，但那也只是说，我们还没踏足。
messages.en: There are many places on this land where we have not yet set foot, but that is only to say that we have not yet set foot.

messages.zh: 今天，这片冰原已经有我踏足了，那么，未来，总会有更多的人来到这里。
messages.en: Today, I have treak through this ice field, so, in the future, there will always be more people coming here.

messages.zh: 即使只是为了这样的可能性，就已经值得我这么去做了。
messages.en: As long as the possibility exists, then it's all worth it.

messages.zh: 那如果终你一生，都没有后来者呢？
messages.en: What if no one comes here in your lifetime?

messages.zh: 那我就会告诉我的孩子，告诉我的接班人，告诉莱茵生命的其他人，让他们维护好这里。
messages.en: Then I would tell my children, tell my successors, and tell the rest of Rhine Lab to please maintain this place.

messages.zh: 因为总有一天，我们的足迹会遍布这一整片大地。
messages.en: Because there will be a day, where our footprints will be all over this vast land.

messages.zh: ......把希望寄托于可能不会发生的未来，真的不会失望吗？
messages.en: ... You won't feel disappointed at all if we place our hopes in a future that may not happen?

messages.zh: 没关系的，对探险家来说，我们一生都在发现，我们也一生都在失望。
messages.en: That's fine. As explorers, we spend our lives discovering new things, and we spend our lives being disappointed on things.

messages.zh: 没有探险家的发现是仅仅依靠自己完成的，每一个探险家都是站在前人的肩膀上，每一个重大的发现连接着遥远的过去。
messages.en: No complete explorer's discovery relies on their own, every explorer is standing on the shoulders of predecessors, every major discovery connected with the distant past.

messages.zh: 就好像我会来到这片冰原，一开始，只是因为在小时候听了一个故事，但是，现在我已经知道，我所追求的，或许是存在的。
messages.en: Just as I had come to this ice sheet, at first, because I had heard a story of this place as a child. Now I know that what I'm seeking for might exist.
... I kind of understand.

messages.zh: 那么，我替你去吧。
messages.en: Very well, I'll go in your stead.

messages.zh: 欸，但是西蒙娜姐姐，你还要找人吧？
messages.en: Huh, Simona, weren't you looking for someone?

messages.zh: 小傻瓜，你难道还没发现，我要找的就是你吗？
messages.en: Don't you see, little fool, that you're the one I'm looking for?

messages.zh: 咦？找我？
messages.en: What? Looking for me?

messages.zh: 我不是说了吗，因为这片风雪太大了，预定的信使已经无法进入这里了，所以梅尔小姐委托我来迎接你回罗德岛。
messages.en: As I said, the couriers are no longer able to get in because of the blizzard, so Miss Mayer has entrusted me with your return to Rhodes Island.

messages.zh: 欸，梅尔姐姐？罗德岛？
messages.en: Huh, sister May? Rhodes Island?

messages.zh: 呵呵，是的。
messages.en: *Chuckles* Yes.

messages.zh: 那么，容我重新自我介绍一下。
messages.en: Well, allow me reintroduce myself.

messages.zh: 罗德岛干员，代号“至霜”。我是来接你的。当然，你可以继续叫我西蒙娜。
messages.en: Rhodes Island operator, code name "Amona". I'm here to bring you back. Of course, you can keep calling me Simona.

messages.zh: 这样啊......但是，真的可以拜托西蒙娜姐姐你吗？
messages.en: I see... But, is it really alright of me to ask for your help, Simona?

messages.zh: 放心，冰雪是我的挚友，是我的亲人。对我来说，现在的外面，如同春天一般温暖。
messages.en: Rest assured, ice and snow is my friend and family. It's like spring out there to me.

messages.zh: 哇，好厉害。
messages.en: Wow, that's awesome.

messages.zh: 呵呵......那么，你可以告诉我，该怎么维修管道，然后在这里乖乖收拾你的行李。
messages.en: Haha... Then, you can tell me how to fix the pipes and then pack up your things here.

messages.zh: 好的！
messages.en: Okay!

messages.zh: 我们一生都在发现，也一生都在失望，吗。
messages.en: We spend our whole lives discovering new things, and we spend our whole lives being disappointed on things, huh?

messages.zh: 愚蠢的萨米人，你们的抵抗没有意义，总有一天，乌萨斯会吞并你们。
messages.en: Stupid Sámian (Sámi), your resistance is meaningless. One day, Ursus will swallow you up.

messages.zh: 恶魔，**，去死，去死啊！！！！
messages.en: Devil, **, die, die!!!!

messages.zh: 啐，恶魔，你的战争结束了，留着你那只瞎掉的眼睛滚回萨米去吧！
messages.en: *Spit*, demon, your war is over, keep that blind eye of yours and go back to Sámi!

messages.zh: 谢谢你，麦哲伦。
messages.en: Thank you so much, Magallan.

messages.zh: “暴风雪从脚下升起，寒风与霜雪遍布全境。”
messages.en: "Blizzard rises from below, its wind, its frost and snow shall cover the whole land."

messages.zh: “留下纯白，生机还有那漆黑的种子。”
messages.en: "Leaving pure white, life, and dark seeds."

messages.zh: “抵抗自然已经耗尽了人们的心力。”
messages.en: "Resistance to nature has exhausted the human heart."

messages.zh: “但总有一些别有用心的家伙早已准备好尖刀，只为饱尝同伴的鲜血。”
messages.en: "But there are always people with ulterior motives who are ready to eat the blood of their own kind."

messages.zh: “歌唱吧，美丽的女孩。悲泣吧，美丽的女孩。”
messages.en: "Sing, pretty maiden. Weep, fair maiden."

messages.zh: “你将变作霜雪，你将化成寒风，你永不灭。”
messages.en: "You will become frost and snow, you will become the cold wind, and you will become immortal."
